channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best DFS Apps 2025: Daily Fantasy Sports Platforms Reviewed
item.description: Compare the best DFS apps for 2025. Explore reviews of UnderDog, DraftKings, Sleeper, and more, including bonuses, features, and contest types.

item.title: BetMGM Bonus Code: Bet $10, Get Up to $1,500 Paid Back in Bonus Bets
item.description: Bet $10 or more, get up to $1,500 back in bonus bets if your first wager loses with our BetMGM sportsbook offer for new users.

item.title: Underdog Promo Code FOXSPORTS: Play $5, Get $100
item.description: Claim the Underdog Fantasy promo code and unlock $100 in bonus cash when you play just $5. Learn how to claim, terms, app features, and more.

item.title: bet365 Bonus Code: Bet $5, Get $200 with Code FOX365
item.description: Claim the bet365 Sportsbook promo code for a first bet offer worth up to $1,000 back in bonus bets if your wager loses.

item.title: Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code 2025
item.description: Check out Caesars Sportsbook to double your winnings on your next 20 bets.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Napoli 'aggressively pushing' for Man United's Mainoo
item.description: A midseason move for Manchester United midfielder Kobbie Mainoo is in Napoli's sights. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Morant mum on feelings after return from ban
item.description: Grizzlies star Ja Morant returned from his one-game suspension and had 18 points and 10 assists in a loss to the Pistons.
